name: Obsessive Web
tag_list: web-consulting, web-consultancy, consulting, consultancy, online-marketing, internet-marketing, seo, ppc, email-marketing, social-marketing, web-strategy, web-usability
overview:
Web consultancy specialising in web strategy, online marketing and web design, with specific expertise in education, travel and sports.

Obsessive Web work on a very personal level - with the offer of seeing any recommendations through to implementation.

A further breakdown of services provided:

* Web strategy
* Internet marketing
* Search engine marketing
* Search engine optimisation (SEO)
* Pay-per-click (PPC)
* Email marketing
* Web design
* Information architecture and web usability
